ðŸ“– Summary: Dulwich is a pure-Python Git implementation that provides an interface to Git repositories without relying on the Git executable. It offers both a lower-level API and higher-level plumbing, making it suitable for environments where Git is not available or a pure Python solution is preferred. Optional Rust bindings are available to improve performance for low-level operations.
